Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Matterhorn \Matterhorn\ prop. n. A mountain in Italy and Switzerland, 14,690 feet high.
Note: According to WordNet, 14,780 feet high [WordNet 1.5]
Matterhorn n : a mountain in the Alps on the border between Switzerland and Italy (14,780 feet high); noted for its distinctive shape
